title: M&A Chatbot - China Chapter
description: M&A Chatbot is our AI developed on the Taxand global M&A Gudie.  It aims to provide support in M&A related tax and other regulations in around 50 countries throughout the world.  Currently, the information is limited to China.

title: Playground
description: Playground is our general AI feed on various professional knowledge and real work experience.  It is being continuously updated on new knowledge and best practices.
